effect_entries.effect:
The first non-damaging move targeting the user this turn that inflicts major status effects, stat changes, or trapping effects will be reflected at its user.

defog, memento, and teeter dance are not reflected.

attract, flatter, gastro acid, leech seed, swagger, worry seed, and yawn are reflected.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
effect_entries.short_effect: Reflects back the first effect move used on the user this turn.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Reflects special effects
back to the attacker.

Reflects special effects
back to the attacker.

Reflects back the
foe’s LEECH SEED
and any status-
damaging move.

A barrier reflects
back to the foe
moves like Leech
Seed and moves
that damage status.

back to the foe
moves like Leech
Seed and moves
that damage status.

A barrier reflects
back to the foe
moves like Leech
Seed and moves
that damage status.

Une barrière qui renvoie les capacités
comme Vampigraine et celles affectant
le statut et les stats.

A barrier reflects back to the target
moves like Leech Seed and moves
that damage status.

A barrier reflects back to the target
moves like Leech Seed and moves
that damage status.

じょうたい　いじょうに　なる　ワザや
やどりぎのタネ　などを
だされたとき　あいてに　はねかえす。

상대가 상태 이상이 되는 기술이나
씨뿌리기 등을 썼을 때 되받아친다.

Une barrière qui renvoie les capacités comme
Vampigraine et celles affectant le statut et
les stats.

Egelsamen und alle Attacken mit Status
verändernden Effekten prallen ab.

Barrera capaz de devolver al agresor movimientos
como Drenadoras y otros que alteran el estado o
las características.

Una barriera rimanda al mittente l’effetto
di mosse come Parassiseme e di mosse
che influenzano lo stato.

A barrier reflects back to the target
moves like Leech Seed and moves
that damage status.

状態異常に　なる　技や
やどりぎのタネ　などを
だされたとき　相手に　跳ね返す。

じょうたい　いじょうに　なる　ワザや
やどりぎのタネ　などを
だされたとき　あいてに　はねかえす。

若對手使用寄生種子或

可將對手的招式反彈回去。

che influenzano lo stato.

Moves like Leech Seed and moves that inflict status
conditions are blocked by a barrier and reflected back
to the user of those moves.

状態異常に　なる　技や
やどりぎのタネ　などを
だされたとき　相手に　跳ね返す。

招式或寄生种子等时，
会将对手的招式反射回去。
